fields.body:
{% extends 'rah/base_email.html' %} {% block email_content %}

Hey {{ content_object.first_name }},

We’re really excited that you’re coming to a {{ content_object.event }}! Mark you calendar now:

Location:
{{ content_object.event.place_name }}
{{ content_object.event.where }}
{{ content_object.event.location }} {{ content_object.event.location.zipcode }}
Time:
{{ content_object.event.start|time }}
Date:
{{ content_object.event.when|date }}

Here’s what {{ author.first_name }} wants you to know:
{{ note }}

Thanks,
The Repower at Home team

{% endblock %}
fields.name: Event reminder
fields.subject: Remember {{ content_object.event }} on {{ content_object.event.when|date }}
